leitej.util

Class StringUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • leitej.util.StringUtil

  • public final class StringUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    An useful class to help in String changes.

    Julio Leite

      • insertObjects

        public static java.lang.String insertObjects(java.lang.String msg,
                                             java.lang.Object... args)
        This method gives the combination between msg and args.
        For every occurrence of a number (i) following by '#' will concatenate the index i of args toString.
        Parameters:
        msg - the data
        args - the objects
        Returns:
        string compounded
